snippet: An examination of the teenager who was snatched from an East Jerusalem street and slain this week found soot in his lungs, according to a senior Palestinian official briefed on the early results.
abstract: Autopsy finds soot in the lungs of Muhammad Abu Khdeir, Palestinian teenager who was snatched from East Jerusalem street and slain, suggesting that he was burned to death after his abduction.

byline.contributor: Said Ghazali and Jonathan Rosen contributed reporting from Jerusalem, and Fares Akram from Gaza.

lead_paragraph: An examination of the teenager who was snatched from an East Jerusalem street and slain this week found soot in his lungs, according to a senior Palestinian official briefed on the early results.

headline.main: Autopsy Suggests Palestinian Teenager Was Burned to Death After Abduction
headline.print_headline: Autopsy Suggests Palestinian Teenager Was Burned to Death After Abduction
